text: Volodymyr Borysovych Groysman (; born January 20, 1978) is a Ukrainian politician. He became the Prime Minister of Ukraine on 14 April 2016.Ukraine MPs approve Volodymyr Groysman as new PM, BBC News (14 April 2016) He is of Jewish descent.Ukrainian president taps Jewish politician to be next prime minister, Jerusalem Post (14 April 2016) ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Ukraine Category:Ukrainian Jews Category:Ukrainian mayors Category:Legislative speakers
title: Volodymyr Groysman
